description: A survey indicates some 26% of firms intend to permanently axe staff amid the coronavirus outbreak.
title: Coronavirus: Quarter of Manx firms 'plan to reduce staff'
title_page: Coronavirus: Quarter of Manx firms 'plan to reduce staff' - BBC News
maintext: Many of the island's businesses have been forced to close to help prevent the spread of the virus but are allowed to offer online and delivery services.
